entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gore Bay
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
